# This code snippet calculates the Fibonacci sequence up to a specified number

# Function to generate the Fibonacci sequence
def fibonacci(n):
    # Initializing the first two terms of the sequence
    F = [0, 1]
    
    # Loop to generate the sequence
    for i in range(2, n):
        # Adding the previous two terms to generate the next term
        F.append(F[i - 1] + F[i - 2])
        
    # Returning the list of Fibonacci sequence numbers
    return F
    
# Taking user input for the number of terms
num = int(input("Enter the number of terms: "))

# Calling the fibonacci function and storing the result in a variable
fib_sequence = fibonacci(num)

# Loop to print the sequence in a formatted way
for i in range(num):
    # Using string formatting to align the numbers
    print("{:d} {:>5}".format(i + 1, fib_sequence[i]))
